entry.title: Introduction to Pyepidemics - epidemiological modeling in Python
entry.summary: We created Pyepidemics, an open-source library to simulate epidemics (SIR, SEIHDR, COVID19). We detail in this article what you can build with the library.

entry.title: Solving the Traveling Salesman Problem with Reinforcement Learning
entry.id: Solving the Traveling Salesman Problem with Reinforcement Learning
entry.summary: A practical use of Reinforcement Learning and the Q-Learning algorithm to solve the Traveling Salesman Problem

entry.title: Deploying a Python Dash application for beginners
entry.summary: Learn the basics of application deployment from simple examples on Heroku to creating Docker containers
